examples.description: uses an external stylesheet via a <link> with rel and href attributes
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage uses an external stylesheet via a <link> with rel and href attributes

examples.description: has a global selector to set font-family of "Helvetica", "Arial", "san-serif"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage General has a global selector to set font-family of "Helvetica", "Arial", "san-serif"

examples.description: has a body selector to make the left and right padding of the page 30px
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage General has a body selector to make the left and right padding of the page 30px

examples.description: sets the header to a height of 100px
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation sets the header to a height of 100px

examples.description: sets the bottom-border to 1px solid #cccccc
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation sets the bottom-border to 1px solid #cccccc

examples.description: floats the nav to the right with a nested selector of "header nav"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation floats the nav to the right with a nested selector of "header nav"

examples.description: removes the padding from the nav ul with a nested selector of "nav ul"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation removes the padding from the nav ul with a nested selector of "nav ul"

examples.description: resets the margin for the nav ul to a 40px top margin with a nested selector of "nav ul"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation resets the margin for the nav ul to a 40px top margin with a nested selector of "nav ul"

examples.description: resets the margin for the nav ul to a 40px top margin with a nested selector of "nav ul"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation resets the margin for the nav ul to a 40px top margin with a nested selector of "nav ul"

examples.description: sets the display of a navigation li to inline with a nested selector of "nav ul li"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation sets the display of a navigation li to inline with a nested selector of "nav ul li"

examples.description: adds a 10px margin to the right of a nav li with a nested selector of 'nav ul li'
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation adds a 10px margin to the right of a nav li with a nested selector of 'nav ul li'

examples.description: styles the navigation links with a nested selector of "nav a"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation styles the navigation links with a nested selector of "nav a"

examples.description: adds a :hover pseudo selector for navigation links with "nav a:hover"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Navigation adds a :hover pseudo selector for navigation links with "nav a:hover"

examples.description: floats the h3 with id of header to the left with a compound element and id selector of h3#header
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Header floats the h3 with id of header to the left with a compound element and id selector of h3#header

examples.description: makes the font-size of h3 with id of header 30px with a compound element and id selector of h3#header
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Header makes the font-size of h3 with id of header 30px with a compound element and id selector of h3#header

examples.description: styles the link in the header with a nested selected of #header a
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Header styles the link in the header with a nested selected of #header a

examples.description: adds a pseudo selector for hover with an underline via #header a:hover
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Header adds a pseudo selector for hover with an underline via #header a:hover

examples.description: has a top margin of 20px via an element selector of "main"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Main has a top margin of 20px via an element selector of "main"

examples.description: creates a rounded border of 5px with an element class selector of div.jumbotron
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Jumbotron creates a rounded border of 5px with an element class selector of div.jumbotron

examples.description: adds a background color of #e9ecef, a 10px padding, and centers the text via an element class selector of div.jumbotron
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Jumbotron adds a background color of #e9ecef, a 10px padding, and centers the text via an element class selector of div.jumbotron

examples.description: makes the font-size of the h1 in a jumbotron 60px via a nested class element selector of ".jumbotron h1"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Jumbotron makes the font-size of the h1 in a jumbotron 60px via a nested class element selector of ".jumbotron h1"

examples.description: styles paragraphs in a jumbotron with a font of 20px, a 40px left right padding, and a line height of 40px via a nested class element selector of ".jumbotron p"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Jumbotron styles paragraphs in a jumbotron with a font of 20px, a 40px left right padding, and a line height of 40px via a nested class element selector of ".jumbotron p"

examples.description: pads the questions div with 20px left and right via an element class selector of "div.questions"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Questions pads the questions div with 20px left and right via an element class selector of "div.questions"

examples.description: styles h4 in div.questions with a font-size of 30px and bottom margin of 10px via a nested selector of "div.questions h4"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Questions styles h4 in div.questions with a font-size of 30px and bottom margin of 10px via a nested selector of "div.questions h4"

examples.description: gives paragraphs in div.questions a top margin of 30px via a "div.questions p" selector
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Questions gives paragraphs in div.questions a top margin of 30px via a "div.questions p" selector

examples.description: makes links with class btn into blue button pills "div.questions a.btn"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Questions makes links with class btn into blue button pills "div.questions a.btn"

examples.description: gives links with class btn into blue button pills with a hover state via "div.questions a.btn:hover"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Questions gives links with class btn into blue button pills with a hover state via "div.questions a.btn:hover"

examples.description: styles the footer with a top border, a top margin, a top padding, and a #CCC color via element selector of "footer"
examples.full_description: A Styled IceBreakers Homepage Footer styles the footer with a top border, a top margin, a top padding, and a #CCC color via element selector of "footer"
